title: Professional Affairs Office
description: Manages administrative professionalism and supports effective service delivery.

title: Plan, Monitoring & Evaluation Office
description: Oversees planning processes, evaluates project progress, and ensures strategic goals are met.

title: Urban Land Management & Registry Office
description: Administers land registration, handles land allocation, and ensures transparent land management.

title: Building Permit & Control Office
description: Issues building permits, regulates construction standards, and oversees compliance with building codes.

title: Legal Service Office
description: Provides legal advice, manages contracts, and supports lawful and ethical operational practices.

title: Finance & Budget Office
description: Manages financial resources, oversees budgeting activities, and ensures proper financial reporting.

title: Human Resource Development Office
description: Handles employee recruitment, development, evaluation, and performance management.

title: ICT & Digital Services Office
description: Manages digital systems, maintains IT infrastructure, and implements digital service improvements.

title: Trade & Investment Office
description: Facilitates trade activities, supports investment initiatives, and promotes economic development.

title: Micro & Small Enterprises Development Office
description: Supports micro and small businesses through capacity building, training, and resource facilitation.

title: Housing Development Office
description: Plans and coordinates residential housing projects and ensures equitable housing development.

title: Social Affairs Office
description: Coordinates community welfare programs, social initiatives, and public safety-related activities.

title: Environmental Protection & Green Development Office
description: Promotes sustainable development, environmental protection, and green initiatives in the sub-city.
